00021 #ifndef _SONAR_H_
00022 #define _SONAR_H_

00041 struct Sonar
00042 {
00043     int sensorPort;         
00044     Vector sensorLocation;  
00045     int sensorOffset;       
00047     /* Thresholds */
00048     int sensorCutOffMin;    
00049     int sensorCutOffMax;    
00050     int toleranceAngle;     
00051     long toleranceDistance; 
00053     /* Sensor motor on which it is mounted */
00054     int sensorMotor;        
00055     int gearRatio;          
00056     int sensorMinAngle;     
00057     int sensorMaxAngle;     
00058     int motorMovePower;     
00059     int motorScanPower;     
00061     /* Current orientation of sensor motor relative to it's rest position */
00062     int currentViewAngle;   
00063     long neutralTachoCount; 
00064     PIDControl pidControl;  
00066 };
00067 
00087 void SonarInit(Sonar &sonar, int sensorPort,
00088                Vector &sensorLocation, int sensorOffset,
00089                int sensorCutOffMin, int sensorCutOffMax,
00090                int toleranceAngle, long toleranceDistance,
00091                int sensorMotor, int gearRatio,
00092                int motorMovePower, int motorScanPower,
00093                int sensorMinAngle, int sensorMaxAngle)
00094 {
00095     sonar.sensorPort = sensorPort;
00096     sonar.sensorMotor = sensorMotor;
00097     sonar.gearRatio = gearRatio;
00098     sonar.sensorMinAngle = sensorMinAngle;
00099     sonar.sensorMaxAngle = sensorMaxAngle;
00100     sonar.sensorCutOffMin = sensorCutOffMin;
00101     sonar.sensorCutOffMax = sensorCutOffMax;
00102     sonar.sensorLocation = sensorLocation;
00103     sonar.sensorOffset = sensorOffset;
00104     sonar.toleranceAngle = toleranceAngle;
00105     sonar.toleranceDistance = toleranceDistance;
00106     sonar.motorMovePower = motorMovePower;
00107     sonar.motorScanPower = motorScanPower;
00108     sonar.currentViewAngle = 0;
00109     sonar.neutralTachoCount = GetOutput(sonar.sensorMotor, TachoCount);
00110     PIDControlInit(sonar.pidControl,
00111                    1000,     /* PID scale */
00112                    450,      /* P value */
00113                    0,        /* I value */
00114                    0,        /* D value */
00115                    5,        /* Steady state counts threshold */
00116                    2,        /* Output gain */
00117                    motorMovePower);   /* Output absolute maximum */
00118 
00119 }
00120 
00125 int SonarGetCurrentViewAngle(Sonar &sonar, Vector &robotLocation)
00126 {
00127     int absoluteAngle;
00128 
00129     absoluteAngle = sonar.currentViewAngle;
00130     absoluteAngle = AngleAbsAdd(absoluteAngle, sonar.sensorLocation.theta);
00131     absoluteAngle = AngleAbsAdd(absoluteAngle, robotLocation.theta);
00132     return absoluteAngle;
00133 }
00134 
00139 int SonarGetMinViewAngle(Sonar &sonar, Vector &robotLocation)
00140 {
00141     int absoluteAngle;
00142 
00143     absoluteAngle = AngleRelToAbs(sonar.sensorMinAngle);
00144     absoluteAngle = AngleAbsAdd(absoluteAngle, sonar.sensorLocation.theta);
00145     absoluteAngle = AngleAbsAdd(absoluteAngle, robotLocation.theta);
00146     return absoluteAngle;
00147 }
00148 
00153 int SonarGetMaxViewAngle(Sonar &sonar, Vector &robotLocation)
00154 {
00155     int absoluteAngle;
00156 
00157     absoluteAngle = AngleRelToAbs(sonar.sensorMaxAngle);
00158     absoluteAngle = AngleAbsAdd(absoluteAngle, sonar.sensorLocation.theta);
00159     absoluteAngle = AngleAbsAdd(absoluteAngle, robotLocation.theta);
00160     return absoluteAngle;
00161 }
00162 
00166 void SonarGetPosition(Sonar &sonar, Vector &robotLocation, Vector &retVec)
00167 {
00168     /* Orient sonar to robot orientation */
00169     retVec = sonar.sensorLocation;
00170     VectorRotate(retVec, robotLocation.theta);
00171     VectorAdd(retVec, robotLocation);
00172     retVec.theta = robotLocation.theta + sonar.sensorLocation.theta;
00173 }
00174 
00189 bool SonarSweep(Sonar &sonar, int angleFrom, int angleTo, long &rangeData[])
00190 {
00191      int samplingPeriod = 20; /* msec */
00192      long motorTacho, output, lastError, tachoFrom, tachoTo;
00193      long senseDistance;
00194      int lastViewAngle, senseAngle, dataSize, dataIndex;
00195      int i;
00196      
00197      /* Run the motor. Speed is evaluated later during positioning */
00198      MotorStart(sonar.sensorMotor, 0);
00199 
00200      lastViewAngle = sonar.currentViewAngle;
00201 
00202      dataSize = ((Abs(angleTo - angleFrom) + 1) * 2);
00203      ArrayInit(rangeData, 0, dataSize);
00204      
00205      /* Initialize rangeData array with angles and unread values (-1) */
00206      if (angleTo > angleFrom)
00207      {
00208          dataIndex = 0;
00209          for (i = angleFrom; i <= angleTo; i++)
00210          {
00211              rangeData[dataIndex] = i;
00212              dataIndex = dataIndex + 1;
00213              rangeData[dataIndex] = -1;
00214              dataIndex = dataIndex + 1;
00215          }
00216      }
00217      else
00218      {
00219          dataIndex = 0;
00220          for (i = angleFrom; i >= angleTo; i--)
00221          {
00222              rangeData[dataIndex] = i;
00223              dataIndex = dataIndex + 1;
00224              rangeData[dataIndex] = -1;
00225              dataIndex = dataIndex + 1;
00226          }
00227      }
00228      
00229      tachoFrom = ((angleFrom - sonar.currentViewAngle) * sonar.gearRatio)/100;
00230      tachoTo = ((angleTo - sonar.currentViewAngle) * sonar.gearRatio)/100;
00231 
00232      /* Find the closest point either 'From' and 'To' angles from current angle,
00233       * to start scanning
00234       */
00235      if (Abs((lastViewAngle - angleFrom)) > Abs((lastViewAngle - angleTo)))
00236      {
00237          long tmp;
00238          tmp = tachoFrom;
00239          tachoTo = tachoFrom;
00240          tachoFrom = tmp;
00241      }
00242 
00243      /* Move to the closest point */
00244      sonar.pidControl.absMaxOutput = sonar.motorMovePower;
00245      PIDControlSetPoint(sonar.pidControl, tachoFrom);
00246      while(!PIDControlCheckEnd(sonar.pidControl))
00247      {
00248          motorTacho = GetOutput(sonar.sensorMotor, BlockTachoCount);
00249          senseAngle = ((motorTacho * 100)/sonar.gearRatio);
00250          sonar.currentViewAngle = lastViewAngle + senseAngle;
00251          output = PIDControlStep(sonar.pidControl, motorTacho);
00252          MotorSetPower(sonar.sensorMotor, output);
00253          Wait(samplingPeriod);
00254      }
00255      
00256      /* Rotate to the 'to' angle and at the same time take sonar readings
00257       * and fill up the rangeData array
00258       */
00259      sonar.pidControl.absMaxOutput = sonar.motorScanPower;
00260      PIDControlSetPoint(sonar.pidControl, tachoTo);
00261      while(!PIDControlCheckEnd(sonar.pidControl))
00262      {
00263          motorTacho = GetOutput(sonar.sensorMotor, BlockTachoCount);
00264 
00265          /* Read sensor */
00266          senseAngle = ((motorTacho * 100)/sonar.gearRatio);
00267          sonar.currentViewAngle = lastViewAngle + senseAngle;
00268          senseDistance = SensorUS(sonar.sensorPort);      /* cm */
00269          senseDistance = senseDistance * 10;              /* mm */
00270          senseDistance += sonar.sensorOffset; /* Reading should be from mount */
00271          dataIndex = 2 * Abs(sonar.currentViewAngle - angleFrom);
00272          if (dataIndex >= 0 && dataIndex < dataSize)
00273          {
00274              if ((senseDistance >= sonar.sensorCutOffMin) &&
00275                  (senseDistance <= sonar.sensorCutOffMax))
00276              {
00277                  rangeData[dataIndex] = sonar.currentViewAngle;
00278                  rangeData[(dataIndex + 1)] = senseDistance;
00279              }
00280          }
00281          /* Adjust output */
00282          output = PIDControlStep(sonar.pidControl, motorTacho);
00283          MotorSetPower(sonar.sensorMotor, output);
00284          Wait(samplingPeriod);
00285      }
00286      MotorStop(sonar.sensorMotor);
00287 }
00288 
00300 void SonarSweepPrint(Sonar &sonar, long &rangeData[], int waitTime)
00301 {
00302     int arrLen = ArrayLen(rangeData);
00303     /*
00304     for (int i = 0; i < arrLen; i++)
00305     {
00306         int x = (i/8) * 40;
00307         int y = (i % 8) * 8;
00308         NumOut(x, y, rangeData[i], true);
00309     }
00310     Wait(waitTime);
00311     */
00312     ClearScreen();
00313     for (int i = 0; i < ArrayLen(rangeData); i++)
00314     {
00315         int theta = 90 + rangeData[i];
00316         i = i + 1;
00317         int d = rangeData[i]/5;
00318         int x = (d * Cos(theta)) / 100;
00319         int y = (d * Sin(theta)) / 100;
00320         if (d > 0)
00321             CircleOut(x + 50, y, 2, false);
00322     }
00323     Wait(waitTime);
00324 }
00325 
00336 bool SonarGetObjectDistanceAtAngle(Sonar &sonar, Vector robotLocation,
00337                                    int viewAngle, long viewDistance,
00338                                    int &retBestAngle, long &retBestDistance)
00339 {
00340     Vector returnObject;
00341     int angleFrom, angleTo, i;
00342     long minima;
00343     long rangeData[];
00344     bool found;
00345 
00346     if ((viewAngle < sonar.sensorMinAngle) || (viewAngle > sonar.sensorMaxAngle))
00347         return false;
00348 
00349     angleFrom = viewAngle - (sonar.toleranceAngle/2);
00350     angleTo = viewAngle + (sonar.toleranceAngle/2);
00351 
00352     SonarSweep(sonar, angleFrom, angleTo, rangeData);
00353     /* SonarSweepPrint(sonar, rangeData, 2000); */
00354 
00355     /* Find the closest reading to the expected distance */
00356     minima = 1000000;
00357     for (i = 0; i < ArrayLen(rangeData); i = i + 2)
00358     {
00359         int dist = rangeData[i+1];
00360         if (dist > 0 && Abs(dist - viewDistance) < minima)
00361         {
00362             retBestDistance = dist;
00363             retBestAngle = rangeData[i];
00364             minima = Abs(retBestDistance - viewDistance);
00365             found = true;
00366         }
00367     }
00368     return found;
00369 }
00370 
00383 bool SonarGetObjectDistanceAtLocation(Sonar &sonar, Vector robotLocation,
00384                                       Vector &viewLocation, int &retBestAngle,
00385                                       long &retBestDistance)
00386 {
00387     Vector sonarLocationWorld, returnObject, objectError;
00388     int viewAngle, bestAngle;
00389     long viewDistance, bestDistance;
00390     long distance;
00391     bool found;
00392     
00393     /* Sonar location in world */
00394     SonarGetPosition(sonar, robotLocation, sonarLocationWorld);
00395 
00396     /* Absolute view angle in the world - 0 to 360 */
00397     viewAngle = VectorGetAngleVec(sonarLocationWorld, viewLocation);
00398     /* View angle relative to sensor orientation */
00399     viewAngle = AngleAbsSub(viewAngle, sonarLocationWorld.theta);
00400     /* Relative view angle - -180 to +180 */
00401     viewAngle = AngleAbsToRel(viewAngle);
00402 
00403     viewDistance = VectorGetDistanceVec(sonarLocationWorld, viewLocation);
00404 
00405     /* Find object at the relative view angle */
00406     found = SonarGetObjectDistanceAtAngle(sonar, robotLocation,
00407                                           viewAngle, viewDistance,
00408                                           bestAngle, bestDistance);
00409     if (found)
00410     {
00411         retBestAngle = bestAngle;
00412         retBestDistance = bestDistance;
00413     }
00414     return found;
00415 }
00416 
00428 bool SonarTriangulateLandmarks(Sonar &sonar, Vector &robotLocation,
00429                                Vector &landmark1, Vector &landmark2,
00430                                Vector &retLocation)
00431 {
00432     bool found, intersect;
00433     long d1, d2;
00434     int angle1, angle2;
00435     Vector sonarLocation, intersect1, intersect2;
00436 
00437     found = SonarGetObjectDistanceAtLocation(sonar, robotLocation, landmark1,
00438                                              angle1, d1);
00439     if (found == false)
00440         return false;
00441 
00442     found = SonarGetObjectDistanceAtLocation(sonar, robotLocation, landmark2,
00443                                              angle2, d2);
00444     if (found == false)
00445         return false;
00446 
00447     intersect = CircleIntersectCircle(landmark1, d1, landmark2, d2,
00448                                       intersect1, intersect2);
00449     if (intersect == false)
00450         return false;
00451 
00452     /* Sonar location in world coordinate */
00453     SonarGetPosition(sonar, robotLocation, sonarLocation);
00454 
00455     d1 = VectorGetDistanceVec(sonarLocation, intersect1);
00456     d2 = VectorGetDistanceVec(sonarLocation, intersect2);
00457     
00458     /* retLoation, currently triangulated position of the sonar, is one
00459      * closest to the current sonar position.
00460      */
00461     if (d1 > d2)
00462         retLocation = intersect2;
00463     else
00464         retLocation = intersect1;
00465 
00466     sonarLocation = sonar.sensorLocation;
00467     VectorRotate(sonarLocation, retLocation.theta);
00468     VectorSubtract(retLocation, sonarLocation);
00469 
00470     /* Fixing robot orientation */
00471     /* Theta set to sonar angle (in world coordinate) */
00472     retLocation.theta = VectorGetAngleVec(retLocation, landmark2);
00473     
00474     /* Theta set to robot orientation by removing sonar angle at the time
00475      * of landmark2 observation.
00476      */
00477     retLocation.theta = AngleAbsSub(retLocation.theta, angle2);
00478 
00479     return true;
00480 }
00481 
00496 bool SonarFindObject(Sonar &sonar, Vector robotLocation, Vector &retObject)
00497 {
00498     long senseDistance = SensorUS(sonar.sensorPort); /* cm */
00499     senseDistance = senseDistance * 10;              /* mm */
00500     senseDistance += sonar.sensorOffset; /* Reading from sensor mount point */
00501     if ((senseDistance >= sonar.sensorCutOffMin) &&
00502         (senseDistance <= sonar.sensorCutOffMax))
00503     {
00504         /* Translate position to robot location */
00505         Vector retObject = robotLocation;
00506         //VectorPrint(retObject, "robotLocation", 2000);
00507         
00508         /* Translate position to sonar location */
00509         VectorAdd(retObject, sonar.sensorLocation);
00510         //VectorPrint(retObject, "sensorLocation", 2000);
00511 
00512         /* Object location relative to the sensor */
00513         int objectAngle = retObject.theta + sonar.currentViewAngle;
00514         
00515         /* Translate position to object location */
00516         VectorTranslate(retObject, senseDistance, objectAngle);
00517         //VectorPrint(retObject, "objectLocation", 2000);
00518 
00519         /* Orientation is meaningless for an object location */
00520         retObject.theta = 0;
00521         
00522         return true;
00523     }
00524     return false;
00525 }
00526 
00536 bool SonarFindObjectAtAngle(Sonar &sonar, Vector robotLocation,
00537                             int viewAngle, long viewDistance,
00538                             Vector &retObject)
00539 {
00540     Vector returnObject;
00541     int angleFrom, angleTo, bestAngle, i;
00542     long bestDistance, minima;
00543     long rangeData[];
00544     bool found;
00545     
00546     if ((viewAngle < sonar.sensorMinAngle) || (viewAngle > sonar.sensorMaxAngle))
00547         return false;
00548 
00549     angleFrom = viewAngle - (sonar.toleranceAngle/2);
00550     angleTo = viewAngle + (sonar.toleranceAngle/2);
00551 
00552     SonarSweep(sonar, angleFrom, angleTo, rangeData);
00553     //SonarSweepPrint(sonar, rangeData, 2000);
00554     
00555     /* Find the closest reading to the expected distance */
00556     minima = 1000000;
00557     for (i = 0; i < ArrayLen(rangeData); i = i + 2)
00558     {
00559         int dist = rangeData[i+1];
00560         if (dist > 0 && Abs(dist - viewDistance) < minima)
00561         {
00562             bestDistance = dist;
00563             bestAngle = rangeData[i];
00564             minima = Abs(bestDistance - viewDistance);
00565             found = true;
00566             NumOut(0, LCD_LINE1, dist, true);
00567             NumOut(0, LCD_LINE2, viewDistance, false);
00568             NumOut(0, LCD_LINE3, minima, false);
00569             Wait(1000);
00570         }
00571     }
00572     
00573     if (found)
00574     {
00575         /* Translate position to robot location */
00576         Vector retObject = robotLocation;
00577 
00578         /* Translate position to sonar location */
00579         VectorAdd(retObject, sonar.sensorLocation);
00580 
00581         /* Object location relative to the sensor */
00582         int objectAngle = retObject.theta + bestAngle;
00583 
00584         /* Translate position to object location */
00585         VectorTranslate(retObject, bestDistance, objectAngle);
00586 
00587         /* Orientation is meaningless for an object location */
00588         retObject.theta = 0;
00589     }
00590     return found;
00591 }
00592 
00602 bool SonarFindObjectAtLocation(Sonar &sonar, Vector robotLocation,
00603                                Vector viewLocation, Vector &retObject)
00604 {
00605     Vector viewLocationRelative, sonarLocationWorld, returnObject, objectError;
00606     int viewAngle;
00607     long viewDistance;
00608     bool found;
00609     
00610     // VectorPrint(viewLocationRelative, "view location", 2000);
00611 
00612     found = false;
00613     
00614     /* Sonar location in world */
00615     sonarLocationWorld = robotLocation;
00616     // VectorPrint(sonarLocationWorld, "Robot location", 2000);
00617     
00618     VectorAdd(sonarLocationWorld, sonar.sensorLocation);
00619     // VectorPrint(sonarLocationWorld, "Sonar location", 2000);
00620 
00621     /* Reference view location relative to sensor */
00622     viewLocationRelative = viewLocation;
00623     VectorSubtract(viewLocationRelative, sonarLocationWorld);
00624     // VectorPrint(viewLocationRelative, "view rel to sonar", 2000);
00625 
00626     /* Reference view angle relative to sensor - 0 to 360 */
00627     viewAngle = VectorGetAngle(viewLocationRelative);
00628     viewDistance = VectorGetDistance(viewLocationRelative);
00629     
00630     /* view angle - -180 to +180 */
00631     if (viewAngle > 180) viewAngle = viewAngle - 360;
00632     
00633     /* Find object at the relative view angle */
00634     found = SonarFindObjectAtAngle(sonar, robotLocation, viewAngle,
00635                                    viewDistance, returnObject);
00636     objectError = returnObject;
00637     VectorSubtract(objectError, viewLocation);
00638     
00639     if (found && (VectorGetDistance(objectError) < sonar.toleranceDistance))
00640         retObject = returnObject;
00641     else
00642         found = false;
00643     return found;
00644 }
00645 
00657 bool SonarFindObjectRelative(Sonar &sonar, Vector &retObject)
00658 {
00659     long senseDistance, objectAngle;
00660 
00661     senseDistance = SensorUS(sonar.sensorPort); /* cm */
00662     senseDistance = senseDistance * 10; /* mm */
00663     senseDistance += sonar.sensorOffset; /* Reading from sensor mount point */
00664     if (senseDistance < sonar.sensorCutOffMin && senseDistance > sonar.sensorCutOffMax)
00665     {
00666         /* Object location relative to the sensor */
00667         objectAngle = sonar.sensorLocation.theta + sonar.currentViewAngle;
00668         retObject.x = sonar.sensorLocation.x + senseDistance * Cos(objectAngle);
00669         retObject.y = sonar.sensorLocation.y + senseDistance * Sin(objectAngle);
00670         retObject.theta = 0;
00671         return true;
00672     }
00673     return false;
00674 }
00675 
00685 bool SonarFindObjectAtAngleRelative(Sonar &sonar, int viewAngle,
00686                                     Vector &retObject)
00687 {
00688     int deltaAngle;
00689     
00690     if ((viewAngle < sonar.sensorMinAngle) || (viewAngle > sonar.sensorMaxAngle))
00691         return false;
00692     deltaAngle = viewAngle - sonar.currentViewAngle;
00693     sonar.currentViewAngle = viewAngle;
00694     deltaAngle = (deltaAngle * sonar.gearRatio) / 100;
00695     if (deltaAngle > 0)
00696         RotateMotor(sonar.sensorMotor, sonar.motorMovePower, deltaAngle);
00697     else if (deltaAngle < 0)
00698         RotateMotor(sonar.sensorMotor, -sonar.motorMovePower, -deltaAngle);
00699     return SonarFindObjectRelative(sonar, retObject);
00700 }

00705 void TestSonar ()
00706 {
00707     Vector robotLocation;
00708     Vector viewLocation1;
00709     Vector viewLocation2;
00710     Sonar sonar;
00711     Vector sensorLocation;
00712     Vector retLocation;
00713     int retBestAngle;
00714     long retBestDistance;
00715     bool success;
00716     long rangeData[];
00717 
00718     VectorInit(sensorLocation, 60, 0, 0);
00719     VectorInit(robotLocation, 0, 0, 0);
00720     VectorInit(viewLocation1, 250, 250, 0);
00721     VectorInit(viewLocation2, 300, 0, 0);
00722 
00723     SetSensorLowspeed(PRIMA_RANGE_SENSOR);
00724     SonarInit(sonar, PRIMA_RANGE_SENSOR, sensorLocation,
00725               10,    /* Sensor reading offset from mount point */
00726               60,    /* Sensor range cutoff (min): 6 cm */
00727               2000,  /* Sensor range cutoff (max): 200 cm */
00728               20,    /* Sensor find area angle: +/- 10 degrees */
00729               100,   /* Sensor find area distance: +/- 10 cm */
00730               OUT_A, /* sonar motor */
00731               500,   /* sonar motor gear ratio */
00732               100,   /* sonar move motor speed */
00733               10,    /* sonar scan motor speed */
00734               -70,   /* sonar motor min angle */
00735               +70);  /* sonar motor max angle */
00736     /*
00737     SonarSweep(sonar, -10, 10, rangeData);
00738     SonarSweepPrint(sonar, rangeData, 2000);
00739     
00740     success = SonarGetObjectDistanceAtAngle(sonar, robotLocation, 45, 150,
00741                                             retBestAngle, retBestDistance);
00742     if (success == true)
00743     {
00744         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, "Best Angle 1", true);
00745         NumOut(0, LCD_LINE2, retBestAngle, false);
00746         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE3, "Best Distance 1", false);
00747         NumOut(0, LCD_LINE4, retBestDistance, false);
00748         Wait(2000);
00749     }
00750     SonarGetObjectDistanceAtLocation (sonar, robotLocation, viewLocation1, retBestAngle,
00751                                                 retBestDistance);
00752     success = true;
00753     if (success == true)
00754     {
00755         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE1, "Best Angle 1", true);
00756         NumOut(0, LCD_LINE2, retBestAngle, false);
00757         TextOut(0, LCD_LINE3, "Best Distance 1", false);
00758         NumOut(0, LCD_LINE4, retBestDistance, false);
00759         Wait(2000);
00760     }
00761     */
00762     success = SonarTriangulateLandmarks(sonar, robotLocation, viewLocation1,
00763                                         viewLocation2, retLocation);
00764     if (success == true)
00765     {
00766         VectorPrint(retLocation, "Robot Location", 2000);
00767     }
00768     Wait(20000);
00769 }
